short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple tools for extracting and coping table information on specific pages in Seller Central website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SC Tools is a free extension for sellers in Amazon who are using Seller Central website. This will help the sellers minimize their time in manual copying of information from the specific tables/pages in the website.

Supported Pages:
- FBA Shipment Contents
- Manage Inventory
- Voice of the Customer

Instructions:
- Simply go to any of these supported pages
- Click the extension
- If the Seller Central page is supported, Extract and copy button will appear
- To extract the data with excel file, just click the Extract button
- If you want to direct copy the data, just click the Copy to Clipboard button then paste it to excel

More tools will be created soon.
